amendment.description: To provide funds for programs on community automatic external defibrillators.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1637 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1637 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR 9/11/2003 S11321-11324; text: CR 9/11/2003 S11324) To provide funds for programs on community automatic external defibrillators.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1637 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1637 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 1542.
